def find(x):
    if parent[x] != parent[parent[x]]: parent[x] = find(parent[x]) 
    return parent[x]

def union(x, y):
    if find(x) == find(y):
        return False
    parent[find(x)] = find(y)
    return True

parent = range(10000)
n, m = map(int, raw_input().split())
for i in range(m):
    a, b = map(int, raw_input().split())
    if not union(a-1, b-1):
        print 'NO'
        break
else:
    print 'YES'
